info.title: BillingAccountsSearch
info.description: This service returns an account used for billing purposes.

post.summary: search billing account information based on criteria
post.description: Lookup billing account information based on criteria using post

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: request

parameters.name: classification-level
parameters.description: Indicates whether the Price Plan or the SOC is at  a Subscriber level or at a BAN level. Valid values:  ACCOUNT / SUBSCRIBER

parameters.name: classification-type
parameters.description: The service type - price plan ,AddOn . Valid values: RATE_PLAN / ADD-ONS

parameters.name: mobile-number
parameters.description: The CTN Number

parameters.name: page-number
parameters.description: The Page Number

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The Page Size

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept-Charset
parameters.description: Character sets that are acceptable.

parameters.name: Accept-Encoding
parameters.description: List of acceptable encodings. See HTTP compression.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: List of acceptable human languages for response

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 access token with the authentication type set as Bearer.

parameters.name: X-Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 access token with the authentication type set as Bearer.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Originator
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 access token with the authentication type set as Bearer.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Content-Length header specifies the actual length of the returned payload.

parameters.name: Date
parameters.description: The date and time that the message was originated (in HTTP-date format as defined by RFC 7231 Date/Time Formats).

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: The If-Modified-Since header specifies date-related conditions to be placed on the execution of a request.  The request will only be executed if the requested resource has not been modified since the date-time specified.  Because the behavior is complex, the details for usage are provided at http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: The If-None-Match header specifies an ETag-related condition to be placed on the execution of a request.  The request will NOT be executed if the ETag of the requested resource matches one of those specified in the If-None-Match header.  Because the behavior is complex, the details for usage are provided at http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html

parameters.name: activityid
parameters.description: Unique id alphanumeric value generated and sent by the partner to identify every the service request uniquely. Sample: XyzA:D1s5s1i-X6AFRvfiPBfs-1234  Pass as is to downstream calls.

parameters.name: applicationid
parameters.description: Identifies the application, system, or tool that is being used to perform the transaction related to this request. Below are the sample values.ACUI, ESERVICE, REBELLION, WARP

parameters.name: applicationuserid
parameters.description: NT id of the one who is managing the transaction from CARE/RETAIL channels.

parameters.name: authcustomerid
parameters.description: Customer id _ of the person that is interacting with the system.

parameters.name: authlineofserviceid
parameters.description: Service Line that the customer intends to operate on, while interacting with the system.

parameters.name: channelid
parameters.description: Identifies the business unit or sales channel for the Request.Below are the sample values:            Care            TeleSales            FullService            BusinessDirect            FinancePartners            NonFinancePartners            SelfServiceAuthenticated            SelfServiceAnonymous            InteractiveVoiceResponse

parameters.name: dealercode
parameters.description: Unique code to identify the dealer/rep user.

parameters.name: interactionid
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: segmentationid
parameters.description: Identifier of customers primary data center.Sample: Polaris,Titan

parameters.name: senderid
parameters.description: Uniquely identifies an Operation consumer. Below are the sample values.ACUI, MYTMO, QVXP, REBELLION, WALMARTRETAIL, SAMSCLUBRETAIL.

parameters.name: sessionid
parameters.description: A value populated by the sender used to track the transactions that occur during a session, a long-lasting interaction that ismaintained by the sender.

parameters.name: storeid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location.

parameters.name: terminalid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store terminal. Needed for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: tillid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail register. Needed for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: A timestamp provided by sender to track their workflow. If it is empty APIGEE can send current system timestamp.

parameters.name: workflowid
parameters.description: Workflow name (NEW/ADD/EXCHANGE/RETURN)/OrderTypes _ ACTIVATION ADDALINE CHANGEDEVICE_JUMP CHANGEDEVICE

207.description: The charges resource has been found.  Returning the ban charges.

Cache-Control.description: No cache indicators supported at this time. Samples: no-cache

Content-Encoding.description: The type of encoding used on the data

Content-Language.description: The natural language or languages of the intended audience for the enclosed content

Content-Length.description: The Content-Length header specifies the actual length of the returned payload.

Content-Type.description: The Content-Length header specifies the actual length of the returned payload.

Date.description: The date and time that the message was originated (in HTTP-date format as defined by RFC 7231 Date/Time Formats).

ETag.description: The ETag header specifies the unique entity tag value for the returned resource.

Last-Modified.description: The Last-Modified entity-header field indicates the date and time at which the origin server believes the variant was last modified.

Transfer-Encoding.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

servicetransactionid.description: Internal identifier for transaction tracking an individual transaction/API request within API platform. Don_t receive/don_t send to downstream

200.description: The charges resource has been found.  Returning the ban charges.

304.description: Not Modified.  Will be returned in the response if Service Agreement and Ban Discount data is not modified since the timestamp mentioned in the request parameter

Last-Modified.description: The Last-Modified entity-header field indicates the date and time at which the origin server believes the variant was last modified.

BillingAccountLookupRequest.description: only one of the following attributes is allowed in the request, sending more than one array will result in a 400 bad request.

_links.description: includes HATEOAS mappings to things like organization and next-organization

code.x-example: valid values: code: B, E, G,I ,N ,R ,S

description.description: based on the combination of status code and reason code

involuntarySuspension.description: indicates whether the ban is on suspend status because of collection, valid values: Y/N

userMessage.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

billCycleStartDate.description: The cycle start date of the last confirmd bill

billCycleEndDate.description: The cycle end date of the last confirmd bill

autoPay.description: An indicator to state if the financial account is registered to autopay. in case the indicator is 'R' the value set to 'opt-out', otherwise 'opt-in'

ErrorCollection.description: The array of error objects. As defined in https://tmobileusa.sharepoint.com/teams/EnterpriseServices/ESG%20Standards%20Documents/APIs/T-Mobile%20API%20Design%20Guidelines%20v1.0.docx
